questions.question: Transformer versions are available for embedded transformers.
Saving a new version of a custom transformer also creates a new FMX file.
When you open a versioned custom transformer, which of the following options are not available to you?
options: Automatically create a new version with all transformers, readers, and writers updated to their newest definition according to your FME version.
Continue making edits to the existing version.
Create a new version to edit.
Make edits to an older version (particularly useful when you can only use that version with an older FME release).

questions.question: You have a workspace with a linked custom transformer (version 1). The author of that transformer makes a series of edits and updates it to version 4. What do you think the upgrade option does to the custom transformer in your workspace?
options: It depends on what version of FME you and the author are using

questions.question: You open an old workspace with several linked custom transformers in it. Where can you check custom transformer versions to see if they need to be upgraded?
options: Looking for Upgradable Transformers in the Navigator
Right-clicking custom transformers and looking for the Upgrade Transformer option
